hi, i strongly sugest you to try Parrot OS and to install it in full encryption mode straight from its installer.
it is a very well designed OS with many programs to play with serious encryption and protect your privacy in deep (at least if you know the basics of the game)

p.s.
Parrot OS downloads are known to be censorship resilient with a powerful mirror network and https webseeded torrents :)
